title: 820-4924 high fan spin
message:
There is green light and turns to amber
The fan spins very fast and the CPU is not getting hot  PPBUS_G3H=12.61 
PP3V42_G3H=3.420
PPVRTC_G3_OUT=3.2
PP5V_S5=5.0

title: 820-4924 high fan spin
message:
Fan shouldn't spin untill CPU gets hot.
If starts with max speed, some SMC sensor is triggered.

Test known good trackpad flex/board first.
Also try disconnecting webcam.

title: 820-4924 high fan spin
message: I tested the board only on the bench without connecting anything the fan starts in max speed

title: 820-4924 high fan spin
message: What did you expect, if temp sensors are not connected???

title: 820-4924 high fan spin
message: I don't know what to check i know it's not normal

title: 820-4924 high fan spin
message:
Any big coil gets voltage?
What about 3V3_S5/SUS, ALL_SYS_PWRGD?

title: 820-4924 high fan spin
message: Remove Q8150 and check again ALL_SYS_PWRGD.

title: 820-4924 high fan spin
message:
"3v3_S0=0.350v"
Fix the problem.
Check diode mode to ground first.
If good, check U8030 voltages.

title: 820-4924 high fan spin
message:
U8030 is looks so ugly some pads are burnt I've fixed it the system now works fine 😊 
Thanks
